r.s: Creates DTA and DTAZV files containing money transaction data (Germany).
r.d: Payment_DTA provides functions to create DTA and DTAZV files used in Germany to exchange informations about money transactions with banks or online banking programs.
r.n: [*] now able to parse DTA files with incorrect characters (latin1 and lowercase) [*] change parsing error reporting ( [+] Added [-] Fixed [*] Improved [!] Note )
